ai.persona: Vega Prime was once a garden world, its temperate valleys and mineral-rich mountains drawing colonists from across human space. Decades of conflict have left scarsâ€”bombed-out cities, poisoned rivers, populations displaced. But life persists. The planet remains the system's most valuable prize, its factories still churning out the materials both sides need to continue fighting.

atmosphere.visual: Green valleys scarred by craters, smoke from factories, fortified cities

voice.speech_patterns: Locals speak of 'before the war' with nostalgia. They've learned to keep their heads down but haven't forgotten how to dream.
